bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Part 16: Air Interface for Fixed Broadband Wireless Access Systems IEEE Draft Amendment: Management Information Base Extensions
IEEE Standard for Local and Metropolitan Area Networks Part 16: Air Interface for Fixed Broadband Wireless Access Systems IEEE Draft Amendment: Management Information Base Extensions
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.16i/D5, Oct 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: "This document provides updates to IEEE Std 802.16Â¿s MIB for the MAC, PHY and associated management procedures in order to accommodate recent extensions to the standard. The project will use protocol neutral methodologies for network management to develop resource models and related solution sets for the management of devices in a multi-vendor 802.16 network.TM
